messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Chianca column on unschooling (No Sandra you don't suck:o)
messages.msgSnippet: My daughter has/had acne. She uses Acne-free with clean and clear advantage. I was VERY sceptical about it. But it DID work. It is the generic brand. Michelle
messages.messageBody:
My daughter has/had acne. She uses Acne-free with clean and clear advantage.
I was VERY sceptical about it. But it DID work. It is the generic brand.

Michelle

nellebelle <nellebelle@...> wrote:
>>>>>>>>A few months ago she said "Hey Mom! I
don't really have acne any more! I've been noticing it since I left school!>>>>>>>>>>>>

I wish it were that simple. My 13yod has never been to school but definitely has acne!

Mary Ellen

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Chianca column on unschooling (No Sandra you don't suck:o)
messages.msgSnippet: ... Stress can make ANY physical state worse, though.
messages.messageBody:
On Feb 27, 2006, at 10:01 AM, nellebelle wrote:

> I wish it were that simple. My 13yod has never been to school but
> definitely has acne!


Stress can make ANY physical state worse, though.
